text:
The attached patch improves the Javadoc for
DailyRollingFileAppender.getDatePattern with the default pattern. This is
Javadoc'd on the ivar, but since it is private, the Javadoc does not show up on
http://logging.apache.org/log4j/docs/api/org/apache/log4j/DailyRollingFileAppender.html
creator: ggregory@seagullsw.com
ggregory@seagullsw.com
text:
Created attachment 12407
Patch for DailyRollingFileAppender v1.29.
